content: hey friends I'm sure most of you know
Vanessa or be in our Facebook crafting group and she sent me this really cool
dice bag all right I wanted to give you guys a look at it
so let's get a closer look and I'll show it to you so here's a close-up and let's
look at the detail on this you can see it looks like these little scale things
here really cool really neat and let me open it up for you and show you so I got
my dice in there but what I really like about this is that it stands up huh
and that cool so you can just set it right next to you on the table and you
have access to your dice without without the bag plopping over it also has these
cool drawstrings you can just close it right back up when you're ready to leave
your game and you're good to go and your dice are protected so thanks again
Vanessa and really loved it thank you so much hey friends and fellow crafters I
want to talk about one more thing - I wanted to plug Vanessa because I'm
really happy that more women are entering the crafting community and
starting to make their own vids I think it's fantastic
so we've got we've got GD art which is also another great channel check that
out but check out the crafting news which is Vanessa's channel she's doing
some great projects on they're really putting her own spin on things and
giving you some great ideas with some of her tips so I go there and check her out
and I'm really excited that more women are getting involved in making these
crafting bits for the community so you're just knocking it out the park
Vanessa and thanks again for the dice bag you guys check out these these
channels with some of our female members making videos and you guys take care go
forth and crafts also our very own Jessica from our Facebook group makes
vids also and she's called the crafty goblin so check out her channel as well
